title: Mac - Patch 6.15 - Can't Close Recent Game Clients

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello. Since patching 6.15, I cannot close past game clients and they slowly stack up the more games I play. Only way to close them is to restart Mac.

They cannot be force closed. (Application is not Responding)
They don't show up on the Activity Monitor.
Prevents the Mac from being shutdown via commands. has to be hard reset.
This happened immediately after patching 6.15.

Mac OX is fully updated.

If I can provide any info please let me know. I'll play a few more games and post another screen cap in a bit.
Thanks in advance.

Forlorn

replies.body: We'd like to look into this and help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so our tech team can review your specific issue further.  Feel free to include the details and screenshot provided in this post.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!

Thank you, ticket has been submitted. REQUEST #22765457

Cheers
Same here. Was about to make a post but this is almost exactly my problem. It gets annoying and makes me not want to play League since it stacks 20 games on my dock.
